title: Amanda Holden nearly spills out of hot pink dress with sexy cut-out at glitzy gala
text:

Amanda Holden always makes a fashionable statement with her complaint-sparking outfits.

And the Britain's Got Talent judge was impossible to miss in her fuchsia number at star-studded The Global Gift Gala London at Kimpton Fitzroy, in London on Thursday.

The telly star, 48, was nearly showed off more than she bargained for in her daring pink dress which had a low neckline that plummeted to just above her stomach.

Amanda showcased her incredible hourglass figure as she emphasised her tiny waist with a sequinned rose design that was fashioned like a belt across her middle.

(Image: GC Images)

(Image: GC Images)

(Image: GC Images)

For the final sexy touch, the blonde bombshell flashed a glimpse of her upper thigh in a racy cut-out which was framed by a dramatic ruffle.

The mother was mixing with the hottest stars of the moment including Love Island's Caroline Flack and Victoria Beckham's BFF Eva Longoria.

It's no wonder Amanda pulled off yet another sexy ensemble.

(Image: GC Images)

(Image: GC Images)

(Image: GC Images)

In June two years ago, she was slapped with 216 complaints about her eye-popping dress on Britain's Got Talent which had a very revealing neckline.

More recently, the blonde bombshell sparked 22 complaints after she dared to wear a spider web-inspired dress that exposed her cleavage.

But Amanda admitted she doesn't feel pressure to dress her age and she revealed she loves to take risks with her wardrobe.

(Image: GC Images)

(Image: GC Images)

She told The MailOnline : "I dress to feel confident. I try not to think about age anymore when I'm dressing.

"My children don't bat an eyelid at what I wear and love borrowing my clothes. Of course, I have fun on Britain's Got Talent, it's the perfect opportunity to take risks.

"Times have changed and I don't feel anyone should feel pressure to dress your age. It's all about body positivity and feeling good."
description: Amanda admitted she feels no pressure to dress her age and always loves to cause a stir with her racy outfits
